course_description: The activity component of this class will combine resistance training (without the use of heavy weight lifting equipment) with aerobic exercise. Students will be exposed to various tools for strength training including stability balls, body bars, and hand weights. Fulfills the PPF requirement.
prerequisites: All students who have fulfilled the PPF requirement of (1) PPF MAY NOT enroll into a second PPF course.
